titleStmt.title: A true account of the behaviour, confessions, and last dying words, of Abraham Bigs, Richard Cabourn, Jane Langworth, and Elizabet Stoaks At Tyburn, on Wednesday the 21th. of December, 1684 for high-treason murther, felony and burglary, &c. Printed by order, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for R. Turner at the Star in Pauls Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
